  Manages an ArubaCloud KeyPair resource.
---

# arubacloud_keypair

Manages an ArubaCloud KeyPair resource.

```terraform
# Note: Keypair updates are not supported by the API.
# Changing name, location, value, or tags requires deleting and recreating the keypair.
resource "arubacloud_keypair" "basic" {
  name       = "example-keypair"
  location   = "ITBG-Bergamo"  # Change to your region
  project_id = "your-project-id"  # Replace with your project ID
  value       = "ssh-rsa "
  tags       = ["compute", "test"]
}
```

## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema


### Arguments

The following arguments are supported:

#### Required

- `id` (String) Keypair identifier

### Attributes Reference

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

#### Read-Only

- `location` (String) Keypair location
- `name` (String) Keypair name
- `project_id` (String) ID of the project this keypair belongs to
- `tags` (List of String) List of tags for the keypair
- `value` (String) Keypair value (public key)
